channel.title: Need help starting from server sorce
channel.description: ok, i have a server, with allll the files, i just need to know how to edit thing, like codes, letting, changing text, moving npc's, making npc's sell and drop certain things... thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 10:18:45 PM[/size][hr]and may i ad,. if i got a server runnning, how i get other ppl to join, where will the ip be? [br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 10:22:15 PM[/size][hr]one more thing, how to make myself or others admin... or mod...

item.title: Need help starting from server sorce
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

It’s not in player.txt, that doesn’t work. Open Client.Java and search “admin list” and scroll down and you’ll see like playerRights = bla bla (“name here”) just make it your name

Read full topic

item.title: Need help starting from server sorce
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

  1. Read Ultimate Server Tutorial
  2. Advertise in the RIGHT section, if no-ip it says, if hamachi roll over ur name
  3. search admin list and change player rights in the character folder .txt files

Read full topic
